text: 8.23: 2 Ko 5.2-4; Ga 5.5; Ef 1.14; 4.30Mba bigira nzɨɨv nziav ki fhuvara. Nza vhɨra nzan ndavi vherir nziav ki. Nza Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ndigi, ana fharigi bigɨn, Fhe Bakɨme fhura anan nza nɨɨŋgi. Nza vhɨra zaa ndiav, ŋgɨɨv, Fhe Bakɨme mba sarigi tuga rargap ki. Fhe Bakɨme mba tugar, ana khueŋ sigi sarav, nza suanga, “Gu nde ndiga won kaman fagi, nde nan tari ma.” Fhe Bakɨme mba tugar, ana nza fhavir muuŋgirim, nta guigira harigi kheshararga.
